news.content:
ðŸš¨ The ThreeFold Validator Verification Process


If youâ€™ve submitted your interest for either an L0 or L2 Validator, we are now pleased to share the verification process with you.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/the-threefold-validators-verification-process/2276


Limited spots remain for both L0 and L2 Validators, so be sure to submit your interest asap via the links above!


And if you have any questions about validators still, please refer to the Validators section of the Library or in particular our FAQs.
news.excerpt: It's time to get the ThreeFold Validators verified!

previous.title: Validator Node Update
previous.excerpt: In support of the establishment of ThreeFoldâ€™s DAO we have officially opened registrations for the first L2 and L0 validators.
